com.ephesoft.dcma.gwt.core.client.ui.widget

Class ClickableImageLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
        • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
          • com.ephesoft.dcma.gwt.core.client.ui.widget.ImageLabel
            • com.ephesoft.dcma.gwt.core.client.ui.widget.ClickableImageLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.HasClickHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasAttachHandlers, com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasVisibility, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsRenderable, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget

    public final class ClickableImageLabel
extends ImageLabel
    Provides custom widget for adding click-able image label on UI. This is use for use case where label needs to be click-able and also needs icons. The ClickableImageLabel extends the ImageLabel to support the use of icon with label.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 21-Jun-2013
    See Also:
    $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$

    • Method Detail

      • getClickableImageLabel

        public static ClickableImageLabel getClickableImageLabel(java.lang.String labelText,
                                         java.lang.String iconURL,
                                         java.lang.String labelTitle,
                                         ImageLabel.ImagePosition imagePosition,
                                         boolean isClickable,
                                         ClickableImageLabel.BackgroundColor backgroundColor)
        Gets the instance of ClickableImageLabel by handling all the parameters passed. All parameters passed can be NULL.

        It ensures the default positioning of image icon to the right of label horizontally. It also ensures label background color is set to transparent if not specified.

        Parameters:
        labelText - String the label text value to be shown on UI
        iconURLCSS - String the CSS name for background image on empty label
        labelTitle - String the title of label shown on mouse hover
        imagePosition - ImageLabel.ImagePosition the position of label icon with respect to label
        isClickable - the value indicating whether label is click-able or not
        backgroundColor - ClickableImageLabel.BackgroundColor the background color of label
        Returns:
        the instance of ClickableImageLabel with respect to parameters passed
